Over 60% of the earth is covered by water yet most of this territory remains largely unexplored.

Different environments in deep sea result in strange lifeforms and creatures.

Discover the fascinating creatures that dwell in the abyssal depths.

‹ ›

THE DEEP SEA A HIDDEN WORLD

Even in the 21st century, the deep sea remains almost entirely unknown. We have sampled less than 1% of the seafloor - we are now beginning to realise the deep is home to a spectacular diversity of organisms.

EXPLORATION

Studying deep sea creatures is problematic; since, with the extreme change in pressure, these creatures can't survive for very long.

Recent Discoveries »

GIANT TUBE WORM

Giant tube worms reproduce by releasing their eggs into the water to be fertilized. After hatching, thelarvae attach themselves to rocks.

Giant tube worms »

CHARACTERISTICS

Fish that live in the extreme environment deep in the bottom of the sea are much different from the animals that live in shallow water.

Deep Sea Charactertistics »
